Hayattan bıkmıs ve olmenin yolunu arıyorsan oyna
Nunca te podes cansar de CS:GO :)

Really good game, very interesting learning curve. Super satisfying because of how bare-bone/primitive the game is. Utility is also super fun to use and so is the gunplay. Furthermore, the steam market is very interesting and adds a lot of spice to the game, I have genuinely never seen such a huge market when it comes to a videogame where the skin market itself is a whole economy and industry. Every map is a new experience, with new angles, new strats, new boosts, and new spots for utility. I am honestly in love with this game and I think the best way to play it is getting 4 other friends together and playing competitive games. The game is frustrating at times but super fun in others, but I've got to say, the fun parts make up for the frustrating parts. Don't solo q, don't play casual, and you should probably get prime.
Fun game to play with friends.  Has a toxicity and hacker problem from time to time, but what game doesn't.  Since it's currently free, I strongly advise a download!
